item.title: Met Gala: 13 of the most eye-catching looks
item.description: Jennifer Lopez, Simone Biles, Dan Levy, Ella Emhoff and Tommy Hilfiger were all on the red carpet.

item.title: Love Island star Amy Hart says she got death threat from 13-year-old
item.description: Amy Hart tells a House of Commons inquiry on influencer culture that social networks should do more.

item.title: R. Kelly abused Aaliyah when she was 13 or 14, court hears
item.description: One of R. Kelly’s former backing dancers testifies at the star's sex trafficking trial in New York.

item.title: Great British Bake Off 2021 contestants revealed
item.description: A police detective, a retired midwife and a software developer are among this year's hopefuls.

item.title: Met Gala 2021: Celebrities show off lavish outfits in New York
item.description: This year's famous guests were inspired by everything from the Matrix to the Statue of Liberty.

item.title: Andrew Neil resigns from GB News three months after channel's launch
item.description: The ex-BBC broadcaster helped to launch the station and briefly appeared as its lead news anchor.

item.title: Tanya Fear: Missing British actress found safe in LA
item.description: Tanya Fear was reported missing by friends and family, who said she had not been seen since last week.

item.title: Taylor Swift: Pop star poses for selfies in Belfast
item.description: Wildest Dreams came true when the American pop princess visited the city.

item.title: Vaccine passports: Covid rule change 'a blow to most vulnerable'
item.description: After plans for vaccine passports were reversed, Newsbeat speaks to those happy and disappointed.

item.title: No sign of £4.8m golden toilet stolen from Blenheim Palace, two years on
item.description: The working 18-carat gold toilet called America was taken from Blenheim Palace.

item.title: Britney Spears announces engagement to Sam Asghari
item.description: The singer, who is fighting a legal battle over her conservatorship, met fiancé Sam Asghari in 2016.

item.title: The Yorkshire Dales village still without TV reception
item.description: In the Yorkshire Dales village of East Witton, every aerial points to the broken transmitter.

item.title: Periods: Festivals need facilities at live events, says singer
item.description: Having a period at festivals can be dehumanising due to a lack of facilities, festival-goers say.

item.title: Arc de Triomphe wrapped in fabric in tribute to artist
item.description: Crowds gather to see the monument draped in plastic for an project inspired by late artist Christo.

item.title: Venice Film Festival: Abortion drama wins top prize
item.description: Audrey Diwan's Happening is set in 1960s France but comes amid debate over strict new laws in Texas.

item.title: Sparks fly at MTV Awards, but not many are on stage
item.description: After a scuffle on the red carpet, the ceremony struggles to generate many big new cultural moments.

item.title: Richard Osman: Trying to make the world a better place
item.description: The TV star and author shares his life lessons on regret, ageing and doing good.

item.title: Phil Wang: I wouldn’t be a comic if I weren't mixed-race
item.description: The TV and stand-up star talks about loneliness, family, food and his viral Tom Hiddleston video.

item.title: Last Night Of The Proms: Accordion tangos end season on a joyous note
item.description: The Last Night concert ended with a tribute to the "healing and uplifting power of music".

item.title: Manic Street Preachers: 'A Design For Life saved us'
item.description: The Welsh band on Trojan horse tracks, losing Richey Edwards and finding a new piano-pop direction.

item.title: 7 highlights from the NTAs - from dogs to trophy stealing
item.description: From cute dogs to trophy stealing, it was a night of chaotic fun at the National Television Awards.

item.title: Playstation Showcase 2021: What we learned
item.description: Sony attempts to turn fan frustration into excitement about new games.

item.title: Met Gala 2021: Which celeb shone brightest on the red carpet?
item.description: After skipping last year because of coronavirus, celebrities went all out in the fashion stakes.

item.title: The Biff, Chip and Kipper books adapted into TV show
item.description: From the classroom to the small screen; meet the actors playing Biff, Chip and Kipper.

item.title: Photographer's images 'like ghosts coming out the mist'
item.description: Guy Bellingham uses a 170-year-old technique to produce striking photos in remarkable detail.

item.title: Red carpet debut for 'Bennifer' 2.0 in Venice
item.description: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez arrive in Venice for the premiere of The Last Duel.

item.title: National Television Awards 2021: Ant and Dec score 20th win
item.description: Ant and Dec scored their 20th consecutive win at the National Television Awards 2021.

item.title: National Television Awards: Stars hit the red carpet
item.description: It's the first big awards night for British TV since the pandemic began.
